00012 module swb_stats

00020   save
00021 
00022   ! rVolConvert combines the conversion factor between inches and meters, and
00023   ! multiplies by the area of a grid cell (assumed to be meters)
00024   real (kind=T_DBL), public :: rVolConvert
00025 
00026   !! Monthly accumulators - to hold SUM of daily values across all cells
00027   real (kind=T_DBL), dimension(iNUM_MONTHS,iNUM_STATS,iNUM_VARIABLES), public :: rMonthly
00028 
00029   !! Daily accumulators - to hold SUM of daily values across all cells
00030   real (kind=T_DBL), dimension(iNUM_STATS,iNUM_VARIABLES), public :: rDaily
00031 
00032   !! Annual accumulators - to hold SUM of daily values across all cells
00033   real (kind=T_DBL), dimension(iNUM_STATS,iNUM_VARIABLES), public :: rAnnual
00034 
00035 contains

00040 subroutine stats_InitializeVolumeConversion(pGrd)
00041 
00042   ![ARGUMENTS]
00043   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd    ! pointer to model grid
00044 
00045   if(pGrd%iLengthUnits == iGRID_LENGTH_UNITS_METERS) then
00046 
00047     rVolConvert = (rONE / 12.0_T_DBL) &
00048                *(pGrd%rGridCellSize ** 2_T_DBL) &
00049                * rSQM_to_SQFT &
00050                / 43560.
00051     ! multiply by area of grid cell in acres (yields acre-ft of water)
00052 
00053   else if(pGrd%iLengthUnits == iGRID_LENGTH_UNITS_FEET) then
00054 
00055     rVolConvert = (rONE / 12.0_T_DBL) &
00056                *(pGrd%rGridCellSize ** 2_T_DBL) &
00057                / 43560.
00058     ! multiply by area of grid cell in acres (yields acre-ft of water)
00059 
00060   else
00061 
00062     call Assert(lFALSE,"The grid cell length units have not been defined")
00063 
00064   end if
00065 
00066   return
00067 
00068 end subroutine stats_InitializeVolumeConversion
00069 
00070 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 
00072 subroutine stats_InitializeDailyAccumulators()
00073 
00074   rDaily(iMIN,:) = HUGE(rDaily(iMIN,:))
00075   rDaily(iMEAN,:) = rZERO
00076   rDaily(iMAX,:) = -HUGE(rDaily(iMAX,:))
00077   rDaily(iSUM,:) = rZERO
00078   rDaily(iLENGTH,:) = rZERO
00079 
00080 end subroutine stats_InitializeDailyAccumulators
00081 
00082 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 
00084 subroutine stats_InitializeMonthlyAccumulators()
00085 
00086   ! Zero out MONTHLY accumulators
00087   rMonthly = rZERO
00088 
00089 end subroutine stats_InitializeMonthlyAccumulators
00090 
00091 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 
00093 subroutine stats_InitializeAnnualAccumulators()
00094 
00095   ! Zero out ANNUAL accumulators
00096   rAnnual = rZERO
00097 
00098 end subroutine stats_InitializeAnnualAccumulators
00099 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 subroutine stats_FormatTextString(sText,rValue,pConfig, &
00101       iVarNum, sFormattedText)
00102 
00103   ![ARGUMENTS]
00104   character(len=*), intent(in) :: sText
00105   real(kind=T_SGL), intent(in), dimension(iNUM_STATS) :: rValue
00106   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig
00107 
00108   integer(kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iVarNum
00109 
00110   character(len=256), dimension(iNUM_STATS) :: sFormattedText
00111   ![LOCALS]
00112   integer(kind=T_INT) :: i
00113   character(len=256) :: sBuf
00114   character(len=1) :: sSpace = ' '
00115   character(len=3) :: sMassBalanceOperator
00116 
00117   ! first write string containing variable names
00118   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors) then
00119     if(rValue(iSUM)>rNEAR_ZERO .or. rValue(iSUM)< -rNEAR_ZERO) then
00120       write(sFormattedText(1),'(A24,$)') sBOLDWHITE// &
00121         REPEAT(sSpace,STAT_INFO(iVarNum)%iIndent)//sText
00122     else
00123       write(sFormattedText(1),'(A24,$)') sWHITE//&
00124         REPEAT(sSpace,STAT_INFO(iVarNum)%iIndent)//sText
00125     end if
00126   else
00127     write(sFormattedText(1),'(A20,$)') &
00128       REPEAT(sSpace,STAT_INFO(iVarNum)%iIndent)//sText
00129   end if
00130 
00131   do i=iMIN,iMAX
00132     if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors) then
00133       if(rValue(i) > rNEAR_ZERO) then
00134         write(sBuf,'(A7,f14.3,$)') sGREEN,rValue(i)
00135       else if(rValue(i) < -rZERO) then
00136         write(sBuf,'(A7,f14.3,$)') sRED,rValue(i)
00137       else
00138         write(sBuf,'(A7,f14.3,$)') sWHITE,rValue(i)
00139       end if
00140     else
00141       write(sBuf,'(f14.3,$)') rValue(i)
00142     end if
00143     sFormattedText(i+1) = sBuf
00144   end do
00145 
00146   i=iSUM
00147 
00148   if(STAT_INFO(iVarNum)%iMassBalanceConst==1) then
00149     sMassBalanceOperator = '(+)'
00150   elseif(STAT_INFO(iVarNum)%iMassBalanceConst==-1) then
00151     sMassBalanceOperator = '(-)'
00152   else
00153     sMassBalanceOperator = '   '
00154   end if
00155 
00156   if(rValue(i) < rNEAR_ZERO .and. rValue(i) > -rNEAR_ZERO &
00157        .or. .not. STAT_INFO(iVarNum)%lShowDailySum) then
00158     sBuf = ' '
00159   else
00160     if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors) then
00161       if(rValue(i) > rNEAR_ZERO) then
00162         write(sBuf,'(A7,F14.2,A7,$)') sGREEN,rValue(i),sMassBalanceOperator
00163       else if(rValue(i) < -rZERO) then
00164         write(sBuf,'(A7,F14.2,A7,$)') sRED,rValue(i),sMassBalanceOperator
00165       else
00166         write(sBuf,'(A7,F14.2,A7,$)') sWHITE,rValue(i),sMassBalanceOperator
00167       end if
00168     else
00169       write(sBuf,'(F14.2,A7,$)') rValue(i),sMassBalanceOperator
00170     end if
00171   end if
00172 
00173   sFormattedText(i+1) = sBuf
00174 
00175   return
00176 
00177 end subroutine stats_FormatTextString

00272 subroutine stats_DumpDailyAccumulatorValues(iLU, pConfig)
00273 
00274   ![ARGUMENTS]
00275   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iLU
00276   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00277                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00278 
00279   ![LOCALS]
00280   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i,j
00281   character(len=256),dimension(iNUM_STATS) :: sText
00282   real (kind=T_DBL),dimension(iNUM_STATS,iNUM_VARIABLES) :: rTempArray
00283   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMassBalance
00284 
00285   rTempArray = rDaily
00286 
00287   rMassBalance = SUM(rTempArray(iSUM,:) &
00288                     * real(STAT_INFO(:)%iMassBalanceConst, kind=T_DBL) ) 
00289                     * rVolConvert
00290 
00291   rTempArray(iSUM,:) = rTempArray(iSUM,:) * rVolConvert
00292 
00293   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) write(iLU,FMT=*) sYELLOW
00294 
00295   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(24x,4(a10,5x))") 'min(in)','mean(in)','max(in)','sum(ac-ft)'
00296 
00297   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) write(iLU,FMT=*) sWHITE
00298 
00299   do i=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00300     call stats_FormatTextString(STAT_INFO(i)%sVARIABLE_NAME, &
00301                 REAL(rTempArray(:,i),kind=T_SGL), 
00302                 pConfig, 
00303                 i, 
00304                 sText)
00305 
00306     if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) then
00307       write(iLU,'(A25,3A22,A28)') sText
00308     else
00309       write(iLU,'(A20,3A15,A21)') sText
00310     end if
00311 
00312   end do
00313 
00314   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(65x,a14)") REPEAT("-",14)
00315   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(51x,a14,F14.2)") 'Mass Balance:', rMassBalance
00316 
00317   return
00318 
00319 end subroutine stats_DumpDailyAccumulatorValues
00320

00323 subroutine stats_DumpMonthlyAccumulatorValues(iLU, iMonth, sMonthName, pConfig)
00324 
00325   ![ARGUMENTS]
00326   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iLU
00327   integer (kind=T_INT),intent(in) :: iMonth        ! month for which to dump data
00328   character (len=3), intent(in) :: sMonthName
00329   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00330                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00331 
00332   ![LOCALS]
00333   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i,j
00334   character(len=256),dimension(iNUM_STATS) :: sText
00335   real (kind=T_DBL),dimension(iNUM_STATS,iNUM_VARIABLES) :: rTempArray
00336   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMassBalance
00337 
00338   rTempArray = rMonthly(iMonth,:,:)
00339 
00340   rMassBalance = SUM(rTempArray(iSUM,:)*STAT_INFO(:)%iMassBalanceConst) &
00341                  * rVolConvert
00342 
00343   rTempArray(iSUM,:) = rTempArray(iSUM,:) * rVolConvert
00344 
00345   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors) write(iLU,FMT=*) sGREEN
00346 
00347 
00348   write(iLU,FMT=*)
00349   write(iLU,FMT=*) REPEAT('-',80)
00350   write(iLU,FMT='(a20,a3)') 'MONTHLY SUMMARY for ',sMonthName
00351   write(iLU,FMT=*) REPEAT('-',80)
00352 
00353   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) write(iLU,FMT=*) sYELLOW
00354   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(24x,4(a10,5x))") 'min(in)','mean(in)','max(in)','sum(ac-ft)'
00355   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) write(iLU,FMT=*) sWHITE
00356 
00357   do i=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00358     if(STAT_INFO(i)%lShowSum) then
00359       call stats_FormatTextString(STAT_INFO(i)%sVARIABLE_NAME, &
00360                 REAL(rTempArray(:,i),kind=T_SGL), 
00361                 pConfig, 
00362                 i, 
00363                 sText)
00364       if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) then
00365         write(iLU,'(A25,3A22,A28)') sText
00366       else
00367         write(iLU,'(A20,3A15,A21)') sText
00368       end if
00369     end if
00370   end do
00371 
00372   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) write(iLU,FMT=*) sWHITE
00373 
00374   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(65x,a14)") REPEAT("-",14)
00375   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(51x,a14,F14.3)") 'Mass Balance:', rMassBalance
00376 
00377   return
00378 
00379 end subroutine stats_DumpMonthlyAccumulatorValues

00383 subroutine stats_DumpAnnualAccumulatorValues(iLU, pConfig, iYear)
00384 
00385   ![ARGUMENTS]
00386   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iLU
00387   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00388                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00389   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iYear
00390   ![LOCALS]
00391   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i,j
00392   character(len=256),dimension(iNUM_STATS) :: sText
00393   real (kind=T_DBL),dimension(iNUM_STATS,iNUM_VARIABLES) :: rTempArray
00394   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMassBalance
00395 
00396   rTempArray = rAnnual
00397 
00398   rTempArray(iSUM,:) = rTempArray(iSUM,:) * rVolConvert
00399 
00400   write(iLU,FMT=*)
00401   write(iLU,FMT=*) REPEAT('*',80)
00402   write(iLU,FMT='(a20,i4)') 'ANNUAL SUMMARY for ',iYear
00403   write(iLU,FMT=*) REPEAT('*',80)
00404 
00405   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) write(iLU,FMT=*) sYELLOW
00406   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(24x,4(a10,5x))") 'min(in)','mean(in)','max(in)','sum(ac-ft)'
00407   if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) write(iLU,FMT=*) sWHITE
00408 
00409   do i=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00410     if(STAT_INFO(i)%lShowSum) then
00411       call stats_FormatTextString(STAT_INFO(i)%sVARIABLE_NAME, &
00412                 REAL(rTempArray(:,i),kind=T_SGL), 
00413                 pConfig, 
00414                 i, 
00415                 sText)
00416       if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors .and. iLU==LU_STD_OUT) then
00417         write(iLU,'(A25,3A22,A28)') sText
00418       else
00419         write(iLU,'(A20,3A15,A21)') sText
00420       end if
00421     end if
00422   end do
00423 
00424   rMassBalance = SUM(rTempArray(iSUM,:)*STAT_INFO(:)%iMassBalanceConst)
00425   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(65x,a14)") REPEAT("-",14)
00426   write(UNIT=iLU,FMT="(51x,a14,F14.3)") 'Mass Balance:', rMassBalance
00427 
00428   return
00429 
00430 end subroutine stats_DumpAnnualAccumulatorValues

00434 subroutine stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rValue,iVarNum,iMonthNum,iNumGridCells)
00435 
00436   ![ARGUMENTS]
00437   real (kind=T_DBL), intent(in) :: rValue
00438   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iVarNum
00439   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonthNum
00440   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iNumGridCells
00441 
00442   ![LOCALS]
00443 !  real (kind=T_SGL) :: rMinimum
00444 
00445   call Assert(LOGICAL(iVarNum>=1 .and. iVarNum <= iNUM_VARIABLES,kind=T_LOGICAL), 
00446     'call to UpdateAllAccumulators failed...inappropriate variable index specified')
00447   call Assert(LOGICAL(iMonthNum>=1 .and. iMonthNum <= iNUM_MONTHS,kind=T_LOGICAL), 
00448     'call to UpdateAllAccumulators failed...inappropriate month index specified')
00449 
00450   if(iNumGridCells > 0) then  ! tidy up and divide by the number of grid cells
00451                               ! NOTE!! rValue is ignored in this instance!!
00452 
00453     rDaily(iMEAN,iVarNum) = rDaily(iSUM,iVarNum) / REAL(iNumGridCells, kind=T_DBL)
00454 
00455     rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMIN,iVarNum) = MIN(rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMIN,iVarNum), &
00456           rDaily(iMIN,iVarNum))
00457     rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMEAN,iVarNum) = rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMEAN,iVarNum) + &
00458           rDaily(iMEAN,iVarNum)
00459     rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMAX,iVarNum) = MAX(rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMAX,iVarNum), &
00460           rDaily(iMAX,iVarNum))
00461     rMonthly(iMonthNum,iSUM,iVarNum) = rMonthly(iMonthNum,iSUM,iVarNum) +  &
00462           rDaily(iSUM,iVarNum)
00463 
00464     rAnnual(iMIN,iVarNum) = MIN(rAnnual(iMIN,iVarNum), rDaily(iMIN,iVarNum))
00465     rAnnual(iMEAN,iVarNum) = rAnnual(iMEAN,iVarNum) + rDaily(iMEAN,iVarNum)
00466     rAnnual(iMAX,iVarNum) = MAX(rAnnual(iMAX,iVarNum), rDaily(iMAX,iVarNum))
00467     rAnnual(iSUM,iVarNum) = rAnnual(iSUM,iVarNum) + rDaily(iSUM,iVarNum)
00468 
00469     call Assert &
00470      (LOGICAL(INT(rDaily(iLENGTH,iVarNum),kind=T_INT)==iNumGridCells,kind=T_LOGICAL), 
00471       "stats.f95: call to UpdateAllAccumulators failed; number of calls" 
00472       // " must be equal to the number of grid cells.")
00473 
00474 
00475   else ! continue to accumulate
00476 
00477     rDaily(iMIN,iVarNum) = min(rDaily(iMIN,iVarNum),rValue)
00478     rDaily(iMAX,iVarNum) = max(rDaily(iMAX,iVarNum),rValue)
00479     rDaily(iSUM,iVarNum) = rDaily(iSUM,iVarNum) + rValue
00480     rDaily(iLENGTH,iVarNum) = rDaily(iLENGTH,iVarNum) + 1
00481 
00482   end if
00483 
00484 end subroutine stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell
00485 
00486 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00487 
00488 subroutine stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByGrid(rMin,rMean,rMax,rSum,iVarNum,iMonthNum)
00489 
00490   ![ARGUMENTS]
00491   real (kind=T_DBL), intent(in) :: rMin,rMean,rMax,rSum
00492   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iVarNum
00493   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonthNum
00494 
00495   ![LOCALS]
00496 
00497   call Assert(LOGICAL(iVarNum>=1 .and. iVarNum <= iNUM_VARIABLES,kind=T_LOGICAL), 
00498     'call to UpdateAllAccumulators failed...inappropriate variable index specified')
00499   call Assert(LOGICAL(iMonthNum>=1 .and. iMonthNum <= iNUM_MONTHS,kind=T_LOGICAL), 
00500     'call to UpdateAllAccumulators failed...inappropriate month index specified')
00501 
00502   rDaily(iMIN,iVarNum) = rMin
00503   rDaily(iMEAN,iVarNum) = rMean
00504   rDaily(iMAX,iVarNum) = rMax
00505   rDaily(iSUM,iVarNum) = rSum
00506 
00507   rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMIN,iVarNum) = rMin + rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMIN,iVarNum)
00508   rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMEAN,iVarNum) = rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMEAN,iVarNum) + rMEAN
00509   rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMAX,iVarNum) = rMax + rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMAX,iVarNum)
00510   rMonthly(iMonthNum,iSUM,iVarNum) = rMonthly(iMonthNum,iSUM,iVarNum) + rSum
00511 
00512   rAnnual(iMIN,iVarNum) = rAnnual(iMIN,iVarNum) + rMin
00513   rAnnual(iMEAN,iVarNum) = rAnnual(iMEAN,iVarNum) + rMEAN
00514   rAnnual(iMAX,iVarNum) = rAnnual(iMAX,iVarNum) + rMax
00515   rAnnual(iSUM,iVarNum) = rAnnual(iSUM,iVarNum) + rSUM
00516 
00517   return
00518 
00519 end subroutine stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByGrid
00520 
00521 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00522 
00528 subroutine stats_CalcMonthlyMeans(iMonthNum, iDaysInMonth)
00529 
00530   ![ARGUMENTS]
00531   integer(kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonthNum
00532   integer(kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iDaysInMonth
00533 
00534   ![LOCALS]
00535   integer(kind=T_INT) :: i
00536 
00537 !  do i=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00538 !    rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMEAN,i) = rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMEAN,i) / iDaysInMonth
00539 !    write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) STAT_INFO(i)%sVARIABLE_NAME, rMonthly(iMonthNum,iMEAN,i),iDaysInMonth
00540 !  end do
00541 
00542 end subroutine stats_CalcMonthlyMeans
00543 
00544 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00545 
00552 
00553 subroutine stats_WriteMinMeanMax( iLU, sText, rData , iCount)
00554 
00555   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
00556   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iLU       ! Fortran logical file unit
00557   real (kind=T_SGL), dimension(:,:) :: rData   ! Real data
00558   character (len=*) :: sText
00559   ! [ LOCALS ]
00560   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumGridCells
00561   integer (kind=T_INT), optional :: iCount
00562 
00563   if(present(iCount)) then
00564     ! establish number of cells in model grid
00565     iNumGridCells = iCount
00566   else
00567     ! establish number of cells in model grid
00568     iNumGridCells = size(rData)
00569   end if
00570 
00571   if(iNumGridCells>0) then
00572     write(iLU,"(1x,a,t31,f12.2,t46,f12.2,t61,f12.2)") TRIM(ADJUSTL(sText)), &
00573        minval(rData),sum(rData)/REAL(iNumGridCells,kind=T_SGL),maxval(rData)
00574   else
00575     write(iLU,"(1x,a,t31,f12.2,t46,f12.2,t61,f12.2)") TRIM(ADJUSTL(sText)), &
00576        minval(rData),sum(rData),maxval(rData)
00577   endif
00578 
00579   flush(iLU)
00580 
00581   return
00582 
00583 end subroutine stats_WriteMinMeanMax
00584 
00585 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00586 
00587 subroutine stats_WriteMSBReport(pGrd,iMonth,iDay,iYear,iDayOfYear)
00588 
00589   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd
00590   integer (kind=T_INT),intent(in) :: iMonth,iDay,iYear,iDayOfYear
00591 
00592   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rDailyMSB
00593 
00594 
00595 !      rDailyMSB = rDaily(iSUM,iGROSS_PRECIP) &
00596 !                   - rDaily(iSUM,iINTERCEPTION) &
00597 !                   - rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV) &
00598 !                   - rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SOIL_MOIST) &
00599 !                   - rDaily(iSUM,iRUNOFF_OUTSIDE) &
00600 !                   - rDaily(iSUM,iREJECTED_RECHARGE) &
00601 !                   - rDaily(iSUM,iACT_ET) &
00602 !                   - rDaily(iSUM,iRECHARGE)
00603 
00604 #ifndef STREAM_INTERACTIONS
00605        rDailyMSB =  rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWFALL) &
00606                   - rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV) &
00607                   + rDaily(iSUM,iNET_PRECIP) &
00608                   + rDaily(iSUM,iINFLOW) &
00609                   - rDaily(iSUM,iOUTFLOW) &
00610                   - rDaily(iSUM,iRUNOFF_OUTSIDE) &
00611                   - rDaily(iSUM,iREJECTED_RECHARGE) &
00612                   - rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SOIL_MOIST) &
00613                   - rDaily(iSUM,iACT_ET) &
00614                   - rDaily(iSUM,iRECHARGE)
00615       write( unit=LU_MSB_REPORT, &
00616            fmt='(I2,",",I2,",",I4,",",I2,"/",I2,"/",I4,",",I3,",",21(F14.2,","),F14.2)' ) &
00617                          iMonth,iDay,iYear,iMonth,iDay,iYear,iDayOfyear, &
00618                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTAvg)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTAvg), &
00619                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMin)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMin), &
00620                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMax)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMax), &
00621                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rCFGI)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rCFGI), &
00622                                                  MINVAL(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN), &
00623                                                  SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN) &
00624                                                      / SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN), &
00625                                                  MAXVAL(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN), &
00626                          rDaily(iSUM,iGROSS_PRECIP)*rVolConvert, &
00627                          rDaily(iSUM,iINTERCEPTION)*rVolConvert, &
00628                          (rDaily(iSUM,iGROSS_PRECIP) - rDaily(iSUM,iINTERCEPTION)) &
00629                                     *rVolConvert, &
00630                          rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWFALL)*rVolConvert, &
00631                          MAX((rDaily(iSUM,iGROSS_PRECIP) - rDaily(iSUM,iINTERCEPTION) &
00632                            - rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWFALL)),0.0D0)*rVolConvert, &
00633                          rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWCOVER)*rVolConvert, &
00634                          rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV)*rVolConvert, &
00635                          rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWMELT)*rVolConvert, &
00636                          rDaily(iSUM,iSOIL_MOISTURE)*rVolConvert, &
00637                          rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SOIL_MOIST)*rVolConvert, &
00638                          rDaily(iSUM,iRUNOFF_OUTSIDE)*rVolConvert, &
00639                          rDaily(iSUM,iREJECTED_RECHARGE)*rVolConvert, &
00640                          rDaily(iSUM,iACT_ET)*rVolConvert, &
00641                          rDaily(iSUM,iRECHARGE)*rVolConvert, &
00642                          rDailyMSB*rVolConvert
00643 #else
00644        rDailyMSB =  rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWFALL) &
00645                   - rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV) &
00646                   + rDaily(iSUM,iNET_PRECIP) &
00647                   + rDaily(iSUM,iINFLOW) &
00648                   - rDaily(iSUM,iOUTFLOW) &
00649                   - rDaily(iSUM,iRUNOFF_OUTSIDE) &
00650                   - rDaily(iSUM,iREJECTED_RECHARGE) &
00651                   - rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SOIL_MOIST) &
00652                   - rDaily(iSUM,iACT_ET) &
00653                   - rDaily(iSUM,iRECHARGE) &
00654                   - rDaily(iSUM,iSTREAM_CAPTURE)
00655       write( unit=LU_MSB_REPORT, &
00656            fmt='(I2,",",I2,",",I4,",",I2,"/",I2,"/",I4,",",I3,",",22(F14.2,","),F14.2)' ) &
00657                          iMonth,iDay,iYear,iMonth,iDay,iYear,iDayOfyear, &
00658                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTAvg)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTAvg), &
00659                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMin)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMin), &
00660                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMax)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMax), &
00661                          SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rCFGI)/SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rCFGI), &
00662                                                  MINVAL(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN), &
00663                                                  SUM(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN) &
00664                                                      / SIZE(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN), &
00665                                                  MAXVAL(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rAdjCN), &
00666                          rDaily(iSUM,iGROSS_PRECIP)*rVolConvert, &
00667                          rDaily(iSUM,iINTERCEPTION)*rVolConvert, &
00668                          (rDaily(iSUM,iGROSS_PRECIP) - rDaily(iSUM,iINTERCEPTION)) &
00669                                     *rVolConvert, &
00670                          rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWFALL)*rVolConvert, &
00671                          MAX((rDaily(iSUM,iGROSS_PRECIP) - rDaily(iSUM,iINTERCEPTION) &
00672                            - rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWFALL)),0.0D0)*rVolConvert, &
00673                          rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWCOVER)*rVolConvert, &
00674                          rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV)*rVolConvert, &
00675                          rDaily(iSUM,iSNOWMELT)*rVolConvert, &
00676                          rDaily(iSUM,iSOIL_MOISTURE)*rVolConvert, &
00677                          rDaily(iSUM,iCHG_IN_SOIL_MOIST)*rVolConvert, &
00678                          rDaily(iSUM,iRUNOFF_OUTSIDE)*rVolConvert, &
00679                          rDaily(iSUM,iREJECTED_RECHARGE)*rVolConvert, &
00680                          rDaily(iSUM,iACT_ET)*rVolConvert, &
00681                          rDaily(iSUM,iRECHARGE)*rVolConvert, &
00682                          rDaily(iSUM,iSTREAM_CAPTURE)*rVolConvert, &
00683                          rDailyMSB*rVolConvert
00684 #endif
00685 
00686 
00687 
00688           flush(unit=LU_MSB_REPORT)
00689 
00690 end subroutine stats_WriteMSBReport
00691 
00692 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00693 
00694 subroutine stats_RewriteGrids(iNX, iNY, rX0, rY0, rX1, rY1, pConfig, pGraph)
00695 
00696   ![ARGUMENTS]
00697   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iNX, iNY       ! Grid dimensions
00698   real (kind=T_DBL), intent(in) :: rX0, rY0          ! Lower-left corner (world coords)
00699   real (kind=T_DBL), intent(in) :: rX1, rY1          ! Upper-right corner (world coords)
00700   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00701                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00702 
00703   type (T_GRAPH_CONFIGURATION), dimension(:), pointer :: pGraph
00704      ! pointer to data structure that holds parameters for creating
00705      ! DISLIN plots
00706 
00707   ![LOCALS]
00708   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd
00709   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i, j, k, iStat, iDayOfYear, iMonth
00710   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iDay, iYear, iVar, iVal, iRep, iTemp
00711   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iStartYear, iEndYear
00712   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iJulianDay, iNumGridCells, iCount
00713   character(len=3) :: sMonthName
00714   real(kind=T_SGL),dimension(iNX*iNY) :: rVal,rValSum,rPad
00715   real(kind=T_SGL) :: rZA, rZE, rZOR, rZSTEP
00716   real(kind=T_SGL) :: rZA_TEMP, rZE_TEMP, rZOR_TEMP, rZSTEP_TEMP
00717   character(len=256) :: sBuf
00718   character(len=1) sDelimiter
00719   logical (kind=T_LOGICAL) :: lMonthEnd
00720   logical (kind=T_LOGICAL) :: lEOF
00721 
00722   iNumGridCells = iNY * iNX
00723   rPad = -9999_T_SGL
00724 
00725   if(len_trim(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix)==0) then
00726 
00727     sDelimiter = ""
00728 
00729   else
00730 
00731     sDelimiter = "_"
00732 
00733   end if
00734 
00735 
00736   ! we need a grid data structure in order that we might call
00737   ! the grid-writing subroutines elsewhere in code
00738   pGrd => grid_Create(iNX, iNY, rX0, rY0, rX1, rY1, T_SGL_GRID)
00739 
00740   do k=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00741 
00742 !  call CHDIR( 'output')
00743 
00744     ! if we don't have any output requested for the current variable,
00745     ! skip the remainder of the loop and go on to the next variable.
00746     if(STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput == iNONE &
00747      .and. STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput == iNONE &
00748      .and. STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput == iNONE)  cycle
00749 
00750     ! ensure any remaining data in buffer is written to the binary file before
00751     ! rewinding and analyzing
00752     flush(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU)
00753 
00754 
00755 !**************************************************************************
00756 ! DAILY GRID and PLOT GENERATION
00757 !**************************************************************************
00758 
00759     if(STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput>iNONE) then
00760 
00761       rewind(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU)
00762       write(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,POS=iENDHEADER_POS)
00763 
00764       write(LU_LOG, &
00765          fmt='("CALCULATING DAILY STATS for ",A)') &
00766            TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME)
00767       flush(LU_LOG)
00768 
00769       ! we are presuming that the binary files are already open.  SHould
00770       ! improve error trapping here.  If we fail to read in the header info,
00771       ! the app should die violently!@!
00772 
00773       do
00774         read(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,iostat=iStat) iDay,iMonth, iYear, iDayOfYear
00775         if(iStat /= 0) then
00776 !        write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'exiting loop in stats.f95 '
00777 !        write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'iStat = ',iStat
00778           exit
00779         end if
00780 
00781 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
00782       write(LU_LOG, &
00783         fmt='("CALCULATING DAILY STATS for ",A,": ",i2.2,"/",i2.2,"/",i4,"  (day ",i3,")")') &
00784         TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),iMonth,iDay,iYear,iDayOfYear
00785         write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'CALCULATING DAILY STATS for ',TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), &
00786          ": ",iMonth,'/',iDay,'/',iYear,'  (day',iDayOfYear,')'
00787 #endif
00788 
00789         call LookupMonth(iMonth, iDay, iYear,iDayOfYear, &
00790                        sMonthName,lMonthEnd)
00791 
00792         pGrd%rData(:,:)= rZERO
00793 
00794        ! name "RLE_readByte" is misleading, since the return value (rVal)
00795        ! is actually a vector of all daily values with dimension (iNY*iNX)
00796        call RLE_readByte(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,pConfig%iRLE_MULT, &
00797           pConfig%rRLE_OFFSET, rVal,iNumGridCells,lEOF)
00798        if(lEOF) exit
00799 
00800        pGrd%rData(:,:)=RESHAPE(rVal,(/iNY,iNX/),PAD=rPad)
00801 
00802 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
00803        call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_LOG, TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), &
00804           pGrd%rData(:,:))
00805 #endif
00806 
00807        if(STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput==iGRID &
00808           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput==iBOTH) then
00809 
00810          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,A,A,A,'_',i4.4,'_',i2.2,'_',i2.2,'.',a)") &
00811            "output"//pConfig%sSlash//"daily"//pConfig%sSlash, &
00812            trim(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix), &
00813            trim(sDelimiter), &
00814            TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), &
00815            iYear,iMonth,iDay, &
00816            trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00817 
00818           if ( pConfig%iOutputFormat == OUTPUT_SURFER ) then
00819 
00820             call grid_WriteSurferGrid(TRIM(sBuf), &
00821               rX0,rX1,rY0,rY1,pGrd%rData(:,:))
00822 
00823           else
00824 
00825             call grid_WriteArcGrid(TRIM(sBuf), &
00826               rX0,rX1,rY0,rY1,pGrd%rData(:,:))
00827 
00828           end if
00829 
00830        end if
00831 
00832 #ifdef GRAPHICS_SUPPORT
00833 
00834        if(STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput==iGRAPH &
00835           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput==iBOTH) then
00836 
00837          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,A,A,A,'_',i4.4,'_',i2.2,'_',i2.2,'.',a)") &
00838            "images"//pConfig%sSlash//"daily"//pConfig%sSlash, &
00839            trim(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix), &
00840            trim(sDelimiter), &
00841            TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), &
00842            iYear,iMonth,iDay, &
00843            TRIM(pGraph(k)%cCDEV)
00844 
00845           pGraph(k)%cSETFIL = TRIM(sBuf)
00846 
00847           write(sBuf,FMT="(A,' ',i2.2,' ',i2.2,' ',i4.4)") &
00848             TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),iMonth,iDay,iYear
00849           pGraph(k)%cTITLE = TRIM(sBuf)
00850 
00851           if( pGraph(k)%rZE(iDAILY) > pGraph(k)%rZA(iDAILY) .and. &
00852                 pGraph(k)%rZSTEP(iDAILY) > rZERO) then
00853 
00854             pGraph(k)%iTimeFrame = iDAILY
00855 
00856             call makegraph(pGraph,pGrd,k)
00857 
00858           end if
00859 
00860        end if
00861 #endif
00862 
00863       end do
00864 
00865     end if
00866 !**************************************************************************
00867 ! MONTHLY GRID and PLOT GENERATION
00868 !**************************************************************************
00869 ! now do it again, only this time sum values by month
00870 
00871   if(STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput>iNONE) then
00872 
00873     rewind(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU)
00874     write(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,POS=iENDHEADER_POS)
00875 
00876     write(LU_LOG, &
00877        fmt="('CALCULATING MONTHLY SUMS for: ',A)") &
00878        TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME)
00879     flush(LU_LOG)
00880 
00881 
00882     rValSum = rZERO
00883 
00884     do
00885       read(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,iostat=iStat) iDay,iMonth, iYear, iDayOfYear
00886       if(iStat /= 0) then
00887 !        write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'exiting loop in stats.f95 '
00888 !        write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'iStat = ',iStat
00889         exit
00890       end if
00891 
00892       call LookupMonth(iMonth, iDay, iYear,iDayOfYear, &
00893                        sMonthName,lMonthEnd)
00894 !
00895 ! Must read in a byte from each data set that has been written to disk for
00896 ! this timestep
00897 !
00898      call RLE_readByte(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,pConfig%iRLE_MULT, &
00899         pConfig%rRLE_OFFSET,rVal,iNumGridCells,lEOF)
00900      if(lEOF) exit
00901 
00902      rValSum = rValSum + rVal
00903 
00904      if(lMonthEnd) then
00905 
00906 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
00907       write(LU_LOG, &
00908         fmt="('CALCULATING MONTHLY SUMS for ',A,': ',A,' ',i4)") &
00909         TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),YEAR_INFO(iMonth)%sFullName,iYear
00910 
00911        write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'CALCULATING MONTHLY SUMS for ',TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), &
00912           ": ",sMonthName,' ',iYear
00913 #endif
00914 
00915        pGrd%rData(:,:)=RESHAPE(rValSum,(/iNY,iNX/),PAD=rPad)
00916 
00917 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
00918        call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_LOG, TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), &
00919           pGrd%rData(:,:))
00920 #endif
00921 
00922        if(STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput == iGRID &
00923         .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput==iBOTH) then
00924 
00925          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,A,A,A,'_',i4.4,'_',i2.2,'.',a)") &
00926            "output"//pConfig%sSlash//"monthly"//pConfig%sSlash, &
00927            TRIM(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix), &
00928            trim(sDelimiter), &
00929            TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),iYear,iMonth, &
00930            TRIM(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00931 
00932          if ( pConfig%iOutputFormat == OUTPUT_SURFER ) then
00933 
00934            call grid_WriteSurferGrid(TRIM(sBuf), &
00935               rX0,rX1,rY0,rY1,pGrd%rData(:,:))
00936 
00937          else
00938 
00939            call grid_WriteArcGrid(TRIM(sBuf), &
00940               rX0,rX1,rY0,rY1,pGrd%rData(:,:))
00941 
00942          end if
00943 
00944        end if
00945 
00946 #ifdef GRAPHICS_SUPPORT
00947 
00948        if(STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput==iGRAPH &
00949           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput==iBOTH) then
00950 
00951          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,A,A,A,'_',i4.4,'_',i2.2,'.',a)") &
00952            "images"//pConfig%sSlash//"monthly"//pConfig%sSlash, &
00953            TRIM(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix), &
00954            trim(sDelimiter), &
00955            TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),iYear,iMonth, &
00956            TRIM(pGraph(k)%cCDEV)
00957          pGraph(k)%cSETFIL = TRIM(sBuf)
00958 
00959          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,' ',A,' ',i4.4)") &
00960             TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),TRIM(YEAR_INFO(iMonth)%sFullName),&
00961               iYear
00962          pGraph(k)%cTITLE = TRIM(sBuf)
00963 
00964          if( pGraph(k)%rZE(iMONTHLY) > pGraph(k)%rZA(iMONTHLY) &
00965             .and. pGraph(k)%rZSTEP(iMONTHLY) > rZERO) then
00966 
00967            pGraph(k)%iTimeFrame = iMONTHLY
00968 
00969            call makegraph(pGraph,pGrd,k)
00970 
00971          end if
00972 
00973        end if
00974 #endif
00975 
00976        rValSum = rZERO
00977      end if
00978 
00979     end do
00980 
00981   endif
00982 !
00983 !**************************************************************************
00984 ! ANNUAL GRID and PLOT GENERATION
00985 !**************************************************************************
00986 ! now do it again, only this time sum values by YEAR
00987 
00988   if(STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput>iNONE) then
00989 
00990     rewind(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU)
00991     write(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,POS=iENDHEADER_POS)
00992 
00993     rValSum(:) = rZERO
00994 
00995     write(LU_LOG,fmt="('CALCULATING ANNUAL SUMS for ',A)") &
00996          TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME)
00997     flush(LU_LOG)
00998 
00999     do
01000       read(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,iostat=iStat) iDay,iMonth, iYear, iDayOfYear
01001       if(iStat /= 0) then
01002 !        write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'exiting loop in stats.f95 '
01003 !        write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'iStat = ',iStat
01004         exit
01005       end if
01006 
01007       call LookupMonth(iMonth, iDay, iYear,iDayOfYear, &
01008                        sMonthName,lMonthEnd)
01009 
01010       iStartYear = iYear
01011 
01012 ! Must read in a byte from each data set that has been written to disk for
01013 ! this timestep
01014 !
01015      call RLE_readByte(STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,pConfig%iRLE_MULT, &
01016          pConfig%rRLE_OFFSET,rVal,iNumGridCells,lEOF)
01017      if(lEOF) exit
01018 
01019      rValSum = rValSum + rVal
01020 
01021 !     call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_LOG, TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), &
01022 !        RESHAPE(rValSum,(/iNY,iNX/),PAD=rPad,ORDER=(/2,1/)))
01023 
01024 !     if(lMonthEnd) then
01025 !     write(LU_LOG, &
01026 !       fmt="('CALCULATING ANNUAL SUMS for ',A,': ',A,' ',i4)") &
01027 !         TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),YEAR_INFO(iMonth)%sFullName,iYear
01028 !     end if
01029 
01030      if(lMonthEnd .and. iMonth == 12) then
01031 
01032        pGrd%rData(:,:)=RESHAPE(rValSum,(/iNY,iNX/),PAD=rPad)
01033 
01034        call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_LOG, STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME, &
01035           pGrd%rData(:,:))
01036 
01037        if(STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput == iGRID &
01038         .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput==iBOTH) then
01039 
01040          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,A,A,A,'_',i4.4,'.',a)") &
01041            "output"//pConfig%sSlash//"annual"//pConfig%sSlash, &
01042             TRIM(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix), &
01043             trim(sDelimiter), &
01044             TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),iYear, &
01045             TRIM(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
01046 
01047          if ( pConfig%iOutputFormat == OUTPUT_SURFER ) then
01048 
01049            call grid_WriteSurferGrid(TRIM(sBuf), &
01050               rX0,rX1,rY0,rY1,pGrd%rData(:,:))
01051 
01052          else
01053 
01054            call grid_WriteArcGrid(TRIM(sBuf), &
01055               rX0,rX1,rY0,rY1,pGrd%rData(:,:))
01056 
01057          end if
01058 
01059        end if
01060 
01061 #ifdef GRAPHICS_SUPPORT
01062 
01063        if(STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput==iGRAPH &
01064           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput==iBOTH) then
01065 
01066          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,A,A,A,'_',i4.4,'.',A)") &
01067             "images"//pConfig%sSlash//"annual"//pConfig%sSlash, &
01068             trim(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix), &
01069             trim(sDelimiter), &
01070             TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME),iYear, &
01071             TRIM(pGraph(k)%cCDEV)
01072          pGraph(k)%cSETFIL = TRIM(sBuf)
01073 
01074          write(sBuf,FMT="(A,' ',i4.4)") &
01075             TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME), iYear
01076          pGraph(k)%cTITLE = TRIM(sBuf)
01077 
01078          if( pGraph(k)%rZE(iANNUAL) > pGraph(k)%rZA(iANNUAL) &
01079             .and. pGraph(k)%rZSTEP(iANNUAL) > rZERO) then
01080 
01081            pGraph(k)%iTimeFrame = iANNUAL
01082 
01083            call makegraph(pGraph,pGrd,k)
01084 
01085          end if
01086 
01087        end if
01088 
01089 #endif
01090 
01091        pGrd%rData(:,:)= rZERO
01092        rValSum = rZERO
01093 
01094      end if
01095 
01096     end do
01097 
01098   endif
01099 
01100   end do
01101 
01102   return
01103 
01104 end subroutine stats_RewriteGrids
01105 
01106 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01107 
01108 subroutine stats_CalcBasinStats(pGrd, pConfig, pGraph)
01109 
01110   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: pGrd            ! pointer to model grid
01111   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01112                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01113   type (T_GRAPH_CONFIGURATION), dimension(:), pointer :: pGraph
01114      ! pointer to data structure that holds parameters for creating
01115      ! DISLIN plots
01116 
01117   ![LOCALS]
01118   type ( T_LANDUSE_LOOKUP ),pointer :: pLU  ! pointer to landuse data structure
01119 
01120   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pTmpGrd
01121 
01122   integer (kind=T_INT) :: j, k, iStat, iCount, n, iMajorityLU, iMajoritySoil
01123   integer (kind=T_INT) ::  iLU_Max, iSoil_Max, iNumGridCells
01124   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rSum, rAvg, rMin, rMax
01125 
01126   character (len=256) :: sBuf
01127 
01128   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: input_grd    ! Pointer to temporary grid for I/O
01129 
01130   call assert(associated(pConfig%BMASK), "Cannot calculate basin statistics; " &
01131     //"must supply a basin mask file to use this feature", &
01132     trim(__FILE__),__LINE__)
01133 
01134   pTmpGrd => grid_Create(pGrd%iNX, pGrd%iNY, pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rY0, &
01135       pGrd%rX1, pGrd%rY1, T_SGL_GRID)
01136 
01137   open(UNIT=LU_MASK_STATS_CSV,FILE="SWB_BASIN_STATS.txt",iostat=iStat,STATUS='REPLACE')
01138   call Assert ( iStat == 0, &
01139     "Could not open basin mask statistics file")
01140 
01141   open(UNIT=LU_PEST_STATS,FILE="SWB_PEST_STATS.txt",iostat=iStat,STATUS='REPLACE')
01142   call Assert ( iStat == 0, &
01143     "Could not open PEST statistics file")
01144 
01145   open(UNIT=LU_PEST_OBS,FILE="SWB_PEST_OBSERVATIONS.txt",iostat=iStat,STATUS='REPLACE')
01146   call Assert ( iStat == 0, &
01147     "Could not open PEST observations file")
01148 
01149   open(UNIT=LU_PEST_INS,FILE="SWB_PEST_INSTRUCTIONS.ins",iostat=iStat,STATUS='REPLACE')
01150   call Assert ( iStat == 0, &
01151     "Could not open PEST instructions file")
01152 
01153   write(unit=LU_PEST_INS,FMT="(A)") "pif $"
01154   write(unit=LU_PEST_OBS,FMT="(A)") "* observation data"
01155 
01156   if(pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation<pConfig%iStartYear) &
01157     pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation = pConfig%iStartYear
01158 
01159   if(pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation>pConfig%iEndYear) &
01160     pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation = pConfig%iEndYear
01161 
01162   n = pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation - pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation + 1
01163 
01164   pTmpGrd%rData = pGrd%Cells%rSUM_Recharge/n
01165 
01166   write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "Number of years in simulation:",n
01167 
01168   write(UNIT=LU_MASK_STATS_CSV,FMT=*) "USGS_UpstreamOrderNum" &
01169     //sTAB//"Basin_Description"//sTAB//"Drainage_area"//sTAB &
01170     //"Majority Land Use"//sTAB//"Majority Soil Type"//sTAB &
01171     //"SWB_Mean_Recharge"//sTAB//"SWB_Min_Recharge"//sTAB &
01172     //"SWB_Max_Recharge"//sTAB//"Baseflow_Recharge"
01173 
01174   do k = 1,size(pConfig%BMASK,1)
01175 
01176     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) k," : Attempting to read mask file: ", &
01177        TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sBasinMaskFilename)
01178     input_grd => grid_Read(TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sBasinMaskFilename), &
01179        "ARC_GRID", T_SGL_GRID )
01180     call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
01181               "Non-conforming grid - filename: " &
01182               // TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sBasinMaskFilename))
01183 
01184     iCount = COUNT(input_grd%rData>0)
01185 
01186     ! sum of the sum of annual recharge values
01187     rSum = SUM(pGrd%Cells%rSUM_Recharge,MASK=input_grd%rData>0)
01188     rMax = MAXVAL(pGrd%Cells%rSUM_Recharge,MASK=input_grd%rData>0) / n
01189     rMin = MINVAL(pGrd%Cells%rSUM_Recharge,MASK=input_grd%rData>0) / n
01190 
01191     rAvg = rSum / iCount / n
01192 
01193     iMajorityLU = 0
01194     iMajoritySoil = 0
01195     iLU_Max = 0
01196     iSoil_Max = 0
01197 
01198     ! iterate through all land use types
01199     do j = 1,size(pConfig%LU,1)
01200 
01201         ! establish number of cells in model grid
01202         iNumGridCells = COUNT( &
01203           INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pConfig%LU(j)%iLandUseType &
01204           .and. input_grd%rData>0 )
01205 
01206         if(iNumGridCells>iLU_Max) then
01207           iLU_Max = iNumGridCells
01208           iMajorityLU = j
01209         end if
01210 
01211     end do
01212 
01213     do j=1,maxval(INT(pGrd%Cells%iSoilGroup,kind=T_INT))
01214 
01215       ! establish number of cells in model grid for THIS combination
01216       iNumGridCells = COUNT( &
01217         INT(pGrd%Cells%iSoilGroup,kind=T_INT)==j &
01218           .and. input_grd%rData>0 )
01219 
01220         if(iNumGridCells>iSoil_Max) then
01221           iSoil_Max = iNumGridCells
01222           iMajoritySoil = j
01223         end if
01224 
01225     end do
01226 
01227     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(A)") ""
01228     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(5x,A)") TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sBasinDescription)
01229     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(5x,'Drainage area (sq mi):', f14.2)") &
01230         pConfig%BMASK(k)%rDrainageArea
01231     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(5x,'Majority Land Use Type:',a)") &
01232         TRIM(pConfig%LU(iMajorityLU)%sLanduseDescription)
01233     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(5x,'Majority Soil Type:',i4)") &
01234         iMajoritySoil
01235     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(8x,A7,i12)") "count:",iCount
01236     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(8x,A7,f14.2)") "sum:",rSum
01237     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(8x,2(A7,f14.2))") "avg:",rAvg,"Qb:",pConfig%BMASK(k)%rQb
01238     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(A)") REPEAT("-",80)
01239     write(UNIT=LU_MASK_STATS_CSV,FMT="(A,a,A,a,f16.4,3a,i4,a,4(f16.4,a))") &
01240        TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sUSGS_UpstreamOrderID),sTAB, &
01241        TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sBasinDescription),sTAB, &
01242        pConfig%BMASK(k)%rDrainageArea,sTAB, &
01243        TRIM(pConfig%LU(iMajorityLU)%sLanduseDescription), sTAB,iMajoritySoil, sTAB,&
01244        rAvg,sTAB,rMin,sTAB,rMax,sTAB,pConfig%BMASK(k)%rQb, sTAB
01245 
01246     write(UNIT=LU_PEST_STATS,FMT="(A,f16.6)") &
01247        ADJUSTL("s"//TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sUSGS_UpstreamOrderID)),rAvg
01248 
01249     if(pConfig%lWriteExtraPestFiles) then
01250       write(UNIT=LU_PEST_OBS,FMT="(A,f8.3,f16.6)") &
01251        ADJUSTL("o"//TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sUSGS_UpstreamOrderID)), &
01252        pConfig%BMASK(k)%rPestWeight, pConfig%BMASK(k)%rQb
01253       write(UNIT=LU_PEST_INS,FMT="(A,A,A)") &
01254        "$s"//TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sUSGS_UpstreamOrderID)//"$ w !", &
01255           ADJUSTL("s"//TRIM(pConfig%BMASK(k)%sUSGS_UpstreamOrderID)),"!"
01256     end if
01257 
01258     close(UNIT=LU_MASK_FILE)
01259 
01260   end do
01261 
01262   flush(UNIT=LU_MASK_STATS_CSV)
01263   flush(UNIT=LU_PEST_STATS)
01264   close(UNIT=LU_MASK_STATS_CSV)
01265   close(UNIT=LU_PEST_STATS)
01266   close(unit=LU_PEST_OBS)
01267   close(unit=LU_PEST_INS)
01268 
01269 end subroutine stats_CalcBasinStats
01270 
01271 !----------------------------------------------------------------------
01272 
01273 subroutine stats_CalcMeanRecharge(pGrd, pConfig, pGraph)
01274 
01275   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: pGrd            ! pointer to model grid
01276   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01277                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01278   type (T_GRAPH_CONFIGURATION), dimension(:), pointer :: pGraph
01279      ! pointer to data structure that holds parameters for creating
01280      ! DISLIN plots
01281 
01282   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pTmpGrd
01283 
01284   integer (kind=T_INT) :: k,n
01285 
01286   character (len=256) :: sBuf
01287 
01288   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: input_grd    ! Pointer to temporary grid for I/O
01289 
01290   pTmpGrd => grid_Create(pGrd%iNX, pGrd%iNY, pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rY0, &
01291       pGrd%rX1, pGrd%rY1, T_SGL_GRID)
01292 
01293   if(pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation<pConfig%iStartYear) &
01294     pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation = pConfig%iStartYear
01295 
01296   if(pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation>pConfig%iEndYear) &
01297     pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation = pConfig%iEndYear
01298 
01299   n = pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation - pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation + 1
01300 
01301   pTmpGrd%rData = pGrd%Cells%rSUM_Recharge/n
01302 
01303   write(LU_LOG, FMT="(a,i4.4,'-',i4.4,':')") &
01304     "Average recharge over period ",pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation,&
01305       pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation
01306 
01307   call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_LOG, "MEAN RECHARGE", &
01308           pTmpGrd%rData)
01309 
01310   write(LU_LOG,FMT="('MEAN RECHARGE, EXCLUDING OPEN WATER CELLS:',f14.3)") &
01311     SUM(pTmpGrd%rData,pGrd%Cells%rSoilWaterCap > rNear_ZERO &
01312             .and. pGrd%Cells%iLandUse /= pConfig%iOPEN_WATER_LU) / &
01313     COUNT(pGrd%Cells%rSoilWaterCap > rNear_ZERO &
01314             .and. pGrd%Cells%iLandUse /= pConfig%iOPEN_WATER_LU)
01315 
01316 
01317   write(sBuf,FMT="('output',a,'MEAN_',a,'_',i4.4,'_',i4.4,'.asc')") &
01318     TRIM(pConfig%sSlash), &
01319     "RECHARGE",pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation, &
01320     pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation
01321   call grid_WriteArcGrid(sBuf,pGrd%rX0,pGrd%rX1,pGrd%rY0,pGrd%rY1, &
01322       pTmpGrd%rData)
01323 
01324 
01325   write(sBuf,FMT="('images',a,'MEAN_',a,i4.4,'_'i4.4,a)") &
01326             TRIM(pConfig%sSlash), &
01327             "RECHARGE",pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation, &
01328             pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation, &
01329             "."//TRIM(pGraph(iRECHARGE)%cCDEV)
01330   pGraph(iRECHARGE)%cSETFIL = TRIM(sBuf)
01331 
01332   write(sBuf,FMT="(A,A,' ',i4.4,'-',i4.4)") "MEAN ", &
01333     "RECHARGE", pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation, &
01334       pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation
01335 
01336 #ifdef GRAPHICS_SUPPORT
01337   pGraph(iRECHARGE)%cTITLE = TRIM(sBuf)
01338   pGraph(iRECHARGE)%iTimeFrame = iANNUAL
01339   call makegraph(pGraph,pTmpGrd,iRECHARGE)
01340 #endif
01341 
01342   write(LU_LOG,FMT=*) REPEAT("-",80)
01343 
01344   return
01345 
01346 end subroutine stats_CalcMeanRecharge
01347 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01348 
01349 subroutine stats_CalcMeanRechargebyLU(pGrd, pConfig, pGraph)
01350 
01351   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: pGrd            ! pointer to model grid
01352   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01353                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01354   type (T_GRAPH_CONFIGURATION), dimension(:), pointer :: pGraph
01355      ! pointer to data structure that holds parameters for creating
01356      ! DISLIN plots
01357 
01358   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pTmpGrd
01359 
01360   ![LOCALS]
01361   type ( T_LANDUSE_LOOKUP ),pointer :: pLU  ! pointer to landuse data structure
01362   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumGridCells
01363 
01364   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i,k,n
01365 
01366   character (len=256) :: sBuf
01367 
01368   if(pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation<pConfig%iStartYear) &
01369     pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation = pConfig%iStartYear
01370 
01371   if(pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation>pConfig%iEndYear) &
01372     pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation = pConfig%iEndYear
01373 
01374   write(LU_LOG, FMT="(a,i4.4,'-',i4.4,':')") &
01375     "Average recharge over period ", &
01376       pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation,&
01377       pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation
01378 
01379   pTmpGrd => grid_Create(pGrd%iNX, pGrd%iNY, pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rY0, &
01380     pGrd%rX1, pGrd%rY1, T_SGL_GRID)
01381 
01382   if(pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation<0) &
01383     pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation = pConfig%iStartYear
01384 
01385   if(pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation<0) &
01386     pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation = pConfig%iEndYear
01387 
01388   n = pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation - pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation + 1
01389 
01390   pTmpGrd%rData = pGrd%Cells%rSUM_Recharge/n
01391 
01392   ! iterate through all land use types
01393   do k = 1,size(pConfig%LU,1)
01394 
01395         !create pointer to a specific land use type
01396         pLU => pConfig%LU(k)
01397                 call Assert(LOGICAL(associated(pLU),kind=T_LOGICAL), 
01398                    "pointer association failed - stats - CalcMeanRechargebyLU")
01399 
01400       ! establish number of cells in model grid
01401       iNumGridCells = COUNT( &
01402         INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType )
01403 
01404       if(iNumGridCells>0) then
01405 
01406         write(LU_LOG,"(a45,3(f12.2,2x))") &
01407           adjustl(pLU%sLandUseDescription), &
01408           minval(pTmpGrd%rData, &
01409           INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType ), &
01410           sum(pTmpGrd%rData, &
01411           INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType ) &
01412              /iNumGridCells, &
01413           maxval(pTmpGrd%rData, &
01414           INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType )
01415 
01416         else
01417 
01418           write(LU_LOG,"(a45)") &
01419            adjustl(pLU%sLandUseDescription)
01420         end if
01421 
01422   end do
01423 
01424   write(LU_LOG, FMT=*) ""
01425   write(LU_LOG, FMT="(a,i4.4,'-',i4.4,':')") &
01426     "Average recharge by landuse and soil type over period ", &
01427       pConfig%iStartYearforCalculation,&
01428       pConfig%iEndYearforCalculation
01429 
01430   write(LU_LOG,"(a30,' Soil Type ',4(a12,2x))") &
01431     "Land Use", "Min (in)","Mean (in)","Max (in)","Count"
01432 
01433   ! Now iterate through all land use types *AND* soil types
01434   do k = 1,size(pConfig%LU,1)
01435 
01436     do i=1,maxval(INT(pGrd%Cells%iSoilGroup,kind=T_INT))
01437 
01438         !create pointer to a specific land use type
01439         pLU => pConfig%LU(k)
01440                 call Assert(LOGICAL(associated(pLU),kind=T_LOGICAL), 
01441                    "pointer association failed - stats - CalcMeanRechargebyLU")
01442 
01443       ! establish number of cells in model grid for THIS combination
01444       iNumGridCells = COUNT( &
01445         INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType &
01446            .and. INT(pGrd%Cells%iSoilGroup,kind=T_INT)==i)
01447 
01448       if(iNumGridCells>0) then
01449 
01450         write(LU_LOG,"(a45,' Soil:',i2,'| ',3(f12.2,2x),i12)") &
01451           adjustl(pLU%sLandUseDescription), &
01452           i, &
01453           minval(pTmpGrd%rData, &
01454           INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType  &
01455            .and. INT(pGrd%Cells%iSoilGroup,kind=T_INT)==i), &
01456           sum(pTmpGrd%rData, &
01457           INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType  &
01458            .and. INT(pGrd%Cells%iSoilGroup,kind=T_INT)==i) &
01459              /iNumGridCells, &
01460           maxval(pTmpGrd%rData, &
01461           INT(pGrd%Cells%iLanduse,kind=T_INT)==pLU%iLandUseType  &
01462            .and. INT(pGrd%Cells%iSoilGroup,kind=T_INT)==i), &
01463           iNumGridCells
01464 
01465 
01466         else
01467 
01468           write(LU_LOG,"(a45,' Soil:',i2,'| ')") &
01469            adjustl(pLU%sLandUseDescription), i
01470 
01471         end if
01472 
01473     end do
01474 
01475   end do
01476 
01477   write(LU_LOG,FMT=*) REPEAT("-",80)
01478 
01479   return
01480 
01481 end subroutine stats_CalcMeanRechargebyLU
01482 
01483 !----------------------------------------------------------------------
01484 
01485 subroutine stats_write_to_SSF_file(pConfig, iSSFindex, iMonth, iDay, iYear, rValue)
01486 
01487   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01488                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01489   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iSSFindex
01490   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonth, iDay, iYear
01491   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rValue
01492 
01493   ! [ LOCALS ]
01494   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i
01495   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iStat
01496   character(len=128) :: sBuf
01497   type (T_SSF_FILES), pointer :: pSSF
01498 
01499 !  if(associated(pConfig%SSF_FILES)) then
01500 
01501     ! MUST ensure that we don't attempt to create a pointer to an
01502     ! element that doesn't exist!!
01503     call Assert(iSSFindex <= size(pConfig%SSF_FILES) .and. &
01504         iSSFindex > 0, "Internal programming error - " &
01505         //"Value for SSFindex falls outside legal bounds: " &
01506         //TRIM(int2char(iSSFindex)), &
01507         TRIM( __FILE__ ), __LINE__ )
01508 
01509     pSSF => pConfig%SSF_FILES(iSSFindex)
01510 
01511     open(unit=pSSF%iLU, file=TRIM(pSSF%sFileName),status='OLD', &
01512         access='APPEND', iostat=iStat)
01513 
01514     sBuf = TRIM(int2char(pSSF%iLU))//"; filename = "//TRIM(pSSF%sFileName)
01515 
01516     call Assert(iStat==0,"Error opening file on unit "//TRIM(sBuf), &
01517         TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
01518 
01519     write(unit=pSSF%iLU,fmt="(a,2x,i2.2,'/',i2.2,'/',i4.4,2x," &
01520         //"'23:59:59',2x,f14.4)") &
01521         TRIM(int2char(pSSF%iColNum))//"_"//TRIM(int2char(pSSF%iRowNum)), &
01522         iMonth, iDay, iYear, &
01523         rValue
01524 
01525     close(unit=pSSF%iLU, iostat=iStat)
01526       call Assert(iStat==0,"Error closing file on unit "//TRIM(sBuf), &
01527         TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
01528 
01529 !  end if
01530 
01531   return
01532 
01533 end subroutine stats_write_to_SSF_file
01534 
01535 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01536 
01537 subroutine stats_OpenBinaryFiles(pConfig, pGrd)
01538 
01539   ![ARGUMENTS]
01540   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig
01541   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: pGrd                ! pointer to model grid
01542 
01543   ! [ LOCALS ]
01544   integer(kind=T_INT) :: i
01545 
01546   do i=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
01547 
01548     if(STAT_INFO(i)%iDailyOutput > iNONE &
01549         .or. STAT_INFO(i)%iMonthlyOutput > iNONE &
01550         .or. STAT_INFO(i)%iAnnualOutput > iNONE)  then
01551 
01552       open(unit=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU, FILE='output'//pConfig%sSlash// &
01553         TRIM(pConfig%sOutputFilePrefix) //"_" &
01554         //TRIM(STAT_INFO(i)%sVARIABLE_NAME) // '.bin',FORM='UNFORMATTED', &
01555         status='REPLACE',ACCESS='STREAM')
01556 
01557       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pGrd%iNX             ! Number of cells in the x-direction
01558       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pGrd%iNY             ! Number of cells in the y-direction
01559       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pGrd%iDataType       ! Type of the grid
01560       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pGrd%rGridCellSize   ! size of one side of a grid cell
01561       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pGrd%iLengthUnits    ! length units code
01562       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) i                    ! STAT_INFO variable number
01563       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pConfig%iRLE_MULT    ! RLE Multiplier
01564       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pConfig%rRLE_OFFSET  ! RLE Offset
01565       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rX1   ! World-coordinate range in X
01566       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) pGrd%rY0, pGrd%rY1   ! World-coordinate range in Y
01567 
01568       inquire(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU,POS=iSTARTDATE_POS)  ! establish location to return to
01569       ! write placeholders for MM/DD/YYYY of start and end of file
01570       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) 9999_T_INT, 9999_T_INT, 9999_T_INT
01571       inquire(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU,POS=iENDDATE_POS)  ! establish location to return to
01572       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU) 9999_T_INT, 9999_T_INT, 9999_T_INT
01573       inquire(UNIT=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU,POS=iENDHEADER_POS)  ! establish location to return to
01574 
01575       write(unit=LU_LOG,fmt=*) "Opened binary file for " &
01576         //TRIM(STAT_INFO(i)%sVARIABLE_NAME)//" on unit " &
01577         //TRIM(int2char(STAT_INFO(i)%iLU))
01578 
01579       write(unit=LU_LOG,fmt=*) "start date offset: "//TRIM(int2char(iSTARTDATE_POS))
01580       write(unit=LU_LOG,fmt=*) "end date offset: "//TRIM(int2char(iENDDATE_POS))
01581 
01582         end if
01583 
01584   end do
01585 
01586 end subroutine stats_OpenBinaryFiles
01587 
01588 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01589 
01590 subroutine stats_CloseBinaryFiles()
01591 
01592   ! [ LOCALS ]
01593   integer(kind=T_INT) :: i
01594 
01595   do i=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
01596 
01597     if(STAT_INFO(i)%iDailyOutput > iNONE &
01598         .or. STAT_INFO(i)%iMonthlyOutput > iNONE &
01599         .or. STAT_INFO(i)%iAnnualOutput > iNONE)  then
01600 
01601       close(unit=STAT_INFO(i)%iLU)
01602 
01603       write(unit=LU_LOG,fmt=*) "Closed binary file for " &
01604         //TRIM(STAT_INFO(i)%sVARIABLE_NAME)//" on unit " &
01605         //TRIM(int2char(STAT_INFO(i)%iLU))
01606 
01607         end if
01608 
01609   end do
01610 
01611 end subroutine stats_CloseBinaryFiles
